entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
